text.div:
RoleClassRelationshipFormal

A relationship between two entities that is formally recognized, frequently by a contract or similar agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleClass where concept is-a _RoleClassRelationshipFormal
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleClass
    CodeDisplay
    _RoleClassRelationshipFormalRoleClassRelationshipFormalA relationship between two entities that is formally recognized, frequently by a contract or similar agreement.
